attributes.action: A petition to get our last petition on bring the sound effect back to the BBC's Final Score Vidiprinter (which got rejected) accepted
attributes.additional_details:
Our last petition was rejected - we don't know why (cos no one told us), we can't speak to anyone (cos there is no person to contact), so we ask you to support this petition to have the reasons for our last petition being rejected reviewed by the Government!

BTW- our last petition called on the Government to make the BBC bring back the sound effect that they used to use when the Final Score vidiprinter was printing out the footy results at the bottom of the screen on a Saturday afternoon.  We had worked hard on it and even used spell check - it deserves to be put to the public!

Briefly - we want the sound back - ok our reasons are nostalgic (you could bring the pools news back as well while you are about it) but does that make them any less worthy?

So come on big government – give the people a say and let football fan power rise!
